reviews.text: My wife and I arrived at The Barrycourt hotel having had to refuse the nearby motel we had booked on the internet from England. We were greeted by the most helpful hotel staff we had found on the whole of our eight week holiday in NZ (we stayed at over 20 different places). All the staff were friendly and helpful and the hotel restaurant was excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent staff
Very helpful and efficient staff
reviews.text: The Barrycourt is a very pleasant hotel in a good suburban location just on the edge of Auckland. The rooms are comfortable, equipped with everything a traveller would need. Views from the higher floors over the city and harbour are stunning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights before joining a cruise ship. It is not in the downtown area but rather in the pleasant leafy suburb of Parnell, yet within walking distance of the city if you like walking. It is also close to the Domain and the Auckland Museum, and Parnell Road has interesting little shops and cafes.
reviews.title: Great food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very pleasant and helpful...especially the restaurant manager who ran up the stairs with our 2 very heavy suitcases when we arrived.
reviews.title: Never again !

reviews.text: We had dinner at the hotel's restaurant both nights and breakfast in the morning. The food was much better than i would have expected for a medium price hotel and I would certainly recommend you try it...even if you are not staying here.
reviews.title: Convenient, Clean and Comfortable

likes.liked: — The Views and the Genuinly happy Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2004, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked into a lower price room in the older motel section but if we ever get there again, I think I would choose to stay in the newer hotel block where the rooms on the upper floors have views of the city and harbour.
reviews.title: Convenient, inexpensive and in good location

reviews.text: We stayed one night in this hotel beginning of january, we read all the comments on tripadvisor and decided to go here. But we were very disappointed as we checked in there late at night. Very impersonal service, old rooms, with a door who didn.t close good. We agreed with the receptionist for a late checkout at 12. But the next morning at 8.30 they already banged on the door to clean the room... Wonderful. We were so disappointed by best western, that the following hotels from best western we went to, we asked everytime to see the room first, before we decided to book it. When we complainted about these things we had to tell the story to 3 different people. Bad communication. Never again.
reviews.title: Great stay!
